Andre Iguodala

Pronunciation: \ig-uh-DAH-luh\

Andre Tyler Iguodala ▪ Instagram: andre

(Iggy, AI2, Dolla Billz)

Position: Small Forward, Shooting Guard, and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 215lb (198cm, 97kg)

Born: January 28, 1984 in Springfield, Illinois us

College: Arizona

High School: Lanphier in Springfield, Illinois

Recruiting Rank: 2002 (27)

Draft: Philadelphia 76ers, 1st round (9th pick, 9th overall), 2004 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 3, 2004

Career Length: 19 years

  • 1x All Star
  • 4x NBA Champ
  • 2004-05 All-Rookie
  • 2x All-Defensive
  • 2014-15 Finals MVP

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Andre Iguodala?

Andre Iguodala is 41 years old.

Where was Andre Iguodala born?

Andre Iguodala was born in Springfield, Illinois.

When was Andre Iguodala born?

Andre Iguodala was born on January 28, 1984.

How tall is Andre Iguodala?

Andre Iguodala is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.

How much did Andre Iguodala weigh when playing?

Andre Iguodala weighed 215 lbs (97 kg) when playing.

Is Andre Iguodala in the Hall of Fame?

Andre Iguodala is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Andre Iguodala drafted?

Andre Iguodala was drafted by Philadelphia 76ers, 1st round (9th pick, 9th overall), 2004 NBA Draft.

What position did Andre Iguodala play?

Small Forward, Shooting Guard, and Power Forward.

When did Andre Iguodala retire?

Andre Iguodala last played in 2023.

What is Andre Iguodala's net worth?

Andre Iguodala made at least $188,802,040 playing professional basketball.

How much did Andre Iguodala make?

Andre Iguodala made $17,185,185 in 2020.

What did Andre Iguodala average?

Andre Iguodala averaged 11.3 points, 4.9 rebounds, and 4.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Andre Iguodala have?

Andre Iguodala won 4 championships.

What is Andre Iguodala's Twitter account?

Andre Iguodala is on Twitter at andre.

What is Andre Iguodala's Instagram account?

Andre Iguodala is on Instagram at andre.

What schools did Andre Iguodala attend?

Andre Iguodala attended Lanphier in Springfield, Illinois and Arizona.

What are Andre Iguodala's nicknames?

Iggy, AI2, Dolla Billz are nicknames for Andre Iguodala.
